item.title: New Technical Advising Committee for arboviroses formed in Rio de Janeiro
item.dc:creator: The Mathematical Epidemiology research group
item.description: This week, a new technical advising committee was created by the Rio de janeiro municipality. Professor Flavio Code√ßo Coelho was one of the academics named, to be part of the committee. The committee will have among its responsibilities to advise the design, monitoring and evaluation of public health policies related to the combat of such diseases.
